extendedInfo.description: â Love Conquers All, Even in Video GamesNobody ever claimed love is easy. "Trace me!" is a perfect illustration of this truth. You play a little boy who wishes to show his love to girlfriend Jenny. You must run, hop, and jump over increasingly difficult levels to reach your soul mate.â Make Your Own Path"Trace me!" is a very unique game. Unlike most jump and avoid the obstacles games, "Trace me!" allows you to draw your own track towards the goal. You draw paths and platforms with your finger as you collect what Jenny asks for (she apparently has a fondness for diamonds and shoes). You can also erase your track if need be. But getting to Jenny isn't as easy as it sounds. Standing between you and your love is a host of obstacles, including buzzsaws, scissors, and falling rocks.â Sometimes Even True Love Needs a Little Help!Kids and adults will both enjoy this challenging, lighthearted game. There is no "lives" system, so you can play a level as many times as you need until you can beat it. If you do find yourself stuck, sneak a peek at the YouTube videos to see how you can draw yourself to victory. Do you have what it takes to make Jenny love you?â Make Jenny love you!â FULL & FREE*!â Unique arcade & puzzle type game.â Draw platforms with your finger and collect what Jenny asks.   â Enjoy 50 unique level designed from easy to hard. - Ad supportedkeywords: jenny, my love jenny, love, trace, trace me, puzzle, unique, best, fun, kid, kids, draw, drawing, hand, hand drawing, painting, paint

reviews.title: Works perfectly fine
reviews.comment: LG optimus M It works great love it to death it\'s very fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: I love the concept of the game, but the joystick is a little screwy. It doesn\'t always respond in the right direction or it doesn\'t respond at all! Frustrating! Please fix!
reviews.author: Valerie Gubitosi

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: So cute and adorable for my daughter who is in love and sex with her boyfriend right now..His name is Jacky Andrew and my daughter is Neo Emilda...Emilda is 18 and Jacky is 20..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it, but..
reviews.comment: Great game but too small for tablets.  Please make hd version.
reviews.author: Rob Frydryck

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I\'ll be playing on a level then it will kick me out and it\'ll say Trace Me has unfortunately stopped
reviews.author: Shannon Dinger

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: The way he walks sucks, so please just fix that and I will give this game five stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Good concept, nice execution, lovely audio, reasonable level progression. Been playing over a year! Never hangs, crashes, or overheats.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Love it! Nice and easy and fun to play too! The only thing it could improve if it had a checkpoint whenever you got the shoe or gem. If it didnt have that then halfway throughout the level you should get a checkpoint. LOVE PLAYIN IT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the joystick
reviews.comment: Its laggy and non responsive. Otherwise.. Chill game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but..
reviews.comment: Its fun but its waayy too tricky to use the joystick! Plus with the joystick there you can\'t draw a path there which makes you fall when your just missing one piece! Otherwise I think its very fun and entertaining.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Adorable ... but kinda pointless

reviews.comment: I wuz soooo disappointed wen it I wuz on level 10......I got a message then like I exited out....I got bak on the game and nearly screamed!!! :( it didnt save! & it didnt tell me!!! >:( thats y I rated it low!!!!!  btw the levelz r ok...and the characters r kinda creepy!!!

reviews.title: Joystick Problems!
reviews.comment: I can only see half of my joystick. The other half is cut off!! Really good concept. Pleasr fix this prob. Until then, 1 star.
reviews.author: Neys Reyes

reviews.title: Wicked fun
reviews.comment: Some levels are easy & others not so much. Kept coming back to finish!

reviews.title: :-)Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s a very addicting game it also is really fun and makes you think

reviews.title: Bring Back ORIGINAL!!!
reviews.comment: This game is fantastic EXCEPT for the new joystick feature. Its awful with th joystick. I played it before they added that n this makes it way more complicated. I\'d give it a 5 if it didnt hav the joystick

reviews.title: Joystick should be an option
reviews.comment: It\'s not reliable enough for a replacement for the move buttons. Just makes it a frustrating experience instead of what should be a fun little game.
